/usr/local/openmpi/4.1.0/gcc/bin/mpicxx -fPIC -std=c++11 -m64 -pthread -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG -m64 -shared -Wl,-soname,libadios2_core_mpi.so.2 -o ../../lib64/libadios2_core_mpi.so.2.7.1 CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/core/IOMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/helper/adiosCommMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/helper/adiosMpiHandshake.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/engine/insitumpi/InSituMPIWriter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/engine/insitumpi/InSituMPIReader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/engine/insitumpi/InSituMPIFunctions.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/engine/insitumpi/InSituMPISchedules.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/engine/ssc/SscReader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/engine/ssc/SscWriter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_core_mpi.dir/engine/ssc/SscHelper.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/home/bw0594/OpenFOAM-v2206/ThirdParty/build/linux64Gcc/ADIOS2-2.7.1/lib64: ../../lib64/libadios2_core.so.2.7.1 ../../lib64/libadios2_taustubs.so
